author: todd
post: I searched for unusual images of Jesus and your image of Him came up. My experience was of His image similar to yours but with two slight differences. The first was His hair and beard which were more substantial, thick and dark. His hair was not “done” for lack of a better word. His hair was more messy but very neat and extremely thick. The second difference was his face which was slightly more square in shape but also very strong as belonging to a very strong body. This image of yours is the closest to what i experienced..
title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
